title: Hot take: Riven is harder to play against than to actually play
body: Next time a Riven [removed by moderation] main claims she takes a lot of skill, just remind them that its their opponents that have to deal with a hyper mobile, low cooldown, no resource required, tanky, cc loaded, AoE assassin.

I dislike Riven mains, I'm an ADC main.

But I hate more the double standards of Boards mods.

I'm sick of hearing shit about "Riven isn't actually hard to play wah wah wah riot too op nerf now pls".  How about instead of complaining about the champ, you try playing her in a ranked match above gold and see that, surprise surprise, its actually not as easy as it looks.  A shit riven will be destroyed by almost any matchup top that isn't just a complete counterpick to the enemy laner, and obviously, that can be said about literally any top lane matchup.  A decent Renekton, Darius, Garen, Camille, Nasus, Fiora, Irelia, hell, even a decent Yasuo, will beat a decent Riven.  I would be willing to say that the majority of Riven mains above gold almost play her almost exclusively, and are very dedicated to the champion.  So it probably makes a lot of sense that say, a really good Riven who has played the matchup 50+ times, will beat a pretty good Darius player who probably does not exclusively play Darius.  In reality, Riven herself isn't the one who needs the nerf, its just that the people who are williing to play her above a certain elo are extremely dedicated to the champion, and are able to practice and learn the matchups and combos extremely well.
Well obviously you can't just pick up and play her. I think what makes Riven so overbearing is that she actually has so many dedicated players/mains.

You need more skill to play against Riven than to actually play her. If someone knows the matchup, obviously they're more equipped to beat her. She has just about everything she could ever ask for in a kit. She can press her buttons in different orders, build different items, take different runes. Most champions like Darius, Garen, and Nasus are given way more limited kits.

Dedication is one thing, but a Garen or Darius main never achieves the same level of success as a Riven main because their champions have very clear limitations. Riven's innate potential to carry a game especially in higher elos is higher than that of most champions, especially the ones that you've listed outside Yasuo. She's got so much potential because her kit allows her to do more. It's harder to fight against something with more tools than to fight with them, even if initially it seems more complex.

I used to play her in diamond, granted it was awhile ago. I stopped bc I got tired of top lane altogether. She's not that deep, though. She's harder to play mentally than she is mechanically.  If a lane is rough, just max e. Lol.
